軜字的基本解释

軜
nà
骖马内侧的缰绳：“鋈以觼軜。”

軜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nà］
［《廣韻》奴荅切，入合，泥。］
骖马的内侧缰绳。

軜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軜； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1240第22
【廣韻】【正韻】?奴荅切，音納。【說文】驂馬內轡，繫軾前者。【詩·秦風】鋈以觼軜。【疏】謂白金飾皮爲觼，以納物也。四馬八轡，而經傳皆言六轡，明有二轡，當繫之馬之有轡者，所以制馬之左右，令之隨逐人意。驂馬欲入，則逼於脅驅，內轡不須牽挽，故知納者，納驂內轡，繫於軾前也。

考證：〔【詩·秦風】鋈以觼軜。【箋】謂白金飾皮爲觼，以納物也。〕　謹照原書箋改疏。
軜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
軜字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Dangle
nà
The reins on the inner side of the stallion: "Flying with each other."
Dangle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nà］
["Guangyun" Slave cut, join together, mud. ]
The inner reins of the stallion.
Dangle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　軜; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1240 22
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Slave cut, sound. 【Said the text】The horse inside the bridle is the former. 【Poetry·Qin Feng】Earth in a hurry. 【Sparse】It is said that platinum ornamental leather is a coquettish, and it is also to contain things. There are four horses and eight bridles, but it is said that there are six bridles, and there are two bridles. When the horse is tied, there is a bridle. If the horse wants to enter, it is forced to drive, and the inner bridle does not need to be pulled. Therefore, those who know and accept the inner bridle are tied in front of Shi. Textual research: [[Poetry·Qin Feng] 鋈一觼軜. 【Jian】It is said that platinum ornamental leather is a coquettish, and it is also to contain things. 〕 　 I would like to change the commentary of the original book.

сущ. * внутренние (средние) вожжи пристяжных (при упряжке четвёркой)
